00014 #ifndef EVENTCODELIST_H
00015 #define EVENTCODELIST_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 #include "TrafficDataTypes.h"
00019 #include "MC2String.h"
00020 #include <algorithm>
00021 
00022 class EventCodeList {
00023 
00024   public:
00028    struct eventCode_entry {
00030       const uint32 eventCode;
00032       const TrafficDataTypes::disturbanceType disturbanceType;
00034       const char* const description;
00036       const TrafficDataTypes::severity severity;
00037    };
00038 
00043    struct eventCodeTable {
00044       uint32 nbrEntries;
00045       const eventCode_entry* const entries;
00046    };
00047    
00048    class EventCodeEntryComp {
00049      public:
00050       bool operator()(const eventCode_entry& a, const eventCode_entry& b) {
00051          return a.eventCode < b.eventCode;
00052       }
00053       bool operator()(const eventCode_entry& a, uint32 code) {
00054          return a.eventCode < code;
00055       }
00056    };
00057    
00059    struct eventCodeTableFindRes {
00060       eventCodeTableFindRes( TrafficDataTypes::disturbanceType theType,
00061                              TrafficDataTypes::severity theSeverity )
00062             : type(theType), severity(theSeverity) {}
00063       TrafficDataTypes::disturbanceType type;
00064       TrafficDataTypes::severity severity;
00065    };
00066    
00074    static eventCodeTableFindRes findInTable( const eventCodeTable& table,
00075                                              uint32 code ) {
00076       const eventCode_entry* begin = table.entries;
00077       const eventCode_entry* end   = table.entries + table.nbrEntries;
00078       const eventCode_entry* found = std::lower_bound( begin, end,
00079                                                         code,
00080                                                         EventCodeEntryComp() );
00081       if ( found->eventCode == code ) {
00082          return eventCodeTableFindRes(found->disturbanceType,
00083                                       found->severity );
00084       } else {
00085          return eventCodeTableFindRes(TrafficDataTypes::NoType,
00086                                       TrafficDataTypes::NoSeverity);
00087       }
00088    }
00089 
00090    // The table with the event codes entries.
00091    static eventCodeTable c_eventCodeTable;
00092    
00093 private:
00094    // An array with all the event code entries.
00095    static eventCode_entry c_eventCodeEntries [1373];  
00096 
00097 };
00098 #endif
